resources.string: The sampler allows previewing audio, adjusting pitch and tempo, editing ADSR envelope, EQ and compression. Use the tabs to switch sections.

On the top of the sampler lay the control bar:
- Play / Pause: preview the sample
- Save: persist project data
- Pitch/Tempo selectors: adjust playback
- Use the ADSR editor for shaping note dynamics.\n- Use EQ faders to cut/boost frequencies.\n- Try short preview loops to fine-tune parameters.
